statements: SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, age FROM Students WHERE grade_level > 10;
SELECT student_name, age FROM Students WHERE age < 18 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT student_name, age, grade_level FROM Students WHERE teacher_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT student_name FROM Students WHERE grade_level BETWEEN 8 AND 12 ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE age > 20 ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, age, grade_level FROM Students WHERE teacher_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT student_name, grade_level FROM Students WHERE age BETWEEN 18 AND 25 AND grade_level >= 10 ORDER BY grade_level ASC, student_name ASC;
SELECT student_name, age FROM Students WHERE age < 18 OR (age >= 25 AND grade_level <= 12);
SELECT MAX(age) AS oldest_age, MIN(age) AS youngest_age FROM Students WHERE grade_level = 12;
SELECT * FROM educators;
SELECT educator_name, department, educator_id FROM educators ORDER BY educator_id DESC;
SELECT student_name, grade_level FROM students WHERE grade_level > 10;
SELECT educator_name FROM educators WHERE department = 'Science';
SELECT * FROM students WHERE educator_id = 3 ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM educators WHERE department = 'Mathematics'
SELECT student_name, grade_level FROM students WHERE grade_level > 10 ORDER BY student_name ASC
SELECT educator_name, department FROM educators JOIN students ON educators.educator_id = students.educator_id WHERE students.grade_level = 12
SELECT educator_name, COUNT(*) as total_students FROM educators JOIN students ON educators.educator_id = students.educator_id GROUP BY educator_name HAVING total_students > 5
SELECT educator_name, AVG(grade_level) as average_grade FROM educators JOIN students ON educators.educator_id = students.educator_id GROUP BY educator_name ORDER BY average_grade DESC
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT name, grade FROM Students WHERE grade > 80;
SELECT name, subject, score FROM Students JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id;
SELECT name, subject FROM Students JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id WHERE score < 60;
SELECT name, grade, subject FROM Students JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id JOIN Teachers ON Students.teacher_id = Teachers.teacher_id WHERE Teachers.subject = 'Math';
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE grade > 80 ORDER BY name ASC, student_id DESC;
SELECT name, grade, teacher_id FROM Students WHERE teacher_id IN (SELECT teacher_id FROM Teachers WHERE subject = 'Math') ORDER BY grade DESC;
SELECT Students.name, Teachers.subject FROM Students JOIN Teachers ON Students.teacher_id = Teachers.teacher_id WHERE Teachers.department = 'Science';
SELECT Students.name, Grades.score FROM Students JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id WHERE Grades.score >= 90 ORDER BY Grades.score DESC;
SELECT AVG(Grades.score) AS average_score, Students.grade FROM Students JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id GROUP BY Students.grade ORDER BY average_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, age FROM Students WHERE grade_level = 'High School';
SELECT teacher_name, department FROM Teachers ORDER BY teacher_id DESC;
SELECT course_name, course_description, teacher_name FROM Courses JOIN Teachers ON Courses.teacher_id = Teachers.teacher_id;
SELECT student_name, course_name, grade FROM Students JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id JOIN Courses ON Grades.course_id = Courses.course_id;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE age > 20 ORDER BY student_name DESC
SELECT student_name, age FROM Students WHERE age BETWEEN 18 AND 25
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Courses INNER JOIN Teachers ON Courses.teacher_id = Teachers.teacher_id WHERE Teachers.department = 'Science'
SELECT student_name, grade FROM Students LEFT JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id
SELECT teacher_name, course_name FROM Courses INNER JOIN Teachers ON Courses.teacher_id = Teachers.teacher_id ORDER BY teacher_name ASC
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM students WHERE grade_level = 10;
SELECT course_name, teacher_id FROM courses ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name, grade_level FROM students WHERE birth_date > '2004-01-01';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM teachers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM students WHERE grade_level > 10;
SELECT first_name, last_name, grade_level FROM students WHERE birth_date < '2000-01-01';
SELECT course_name, start_date, end_date FROM courses WHERE teacher_id = 3 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM teachers WHERE first_name LIKE 'J%' AND last_name LIKE 'D%';
SELECT s.first_name, s.last_name, c.course_name, sg.grade FROM students s JOIN student_grades sg ON s.student_id = sg.student_id JOIN courses c ON sg.course_id = c.course_id WHERE s.grade_level < 12;
